name: Vaadin.EmailFieldElement
description:
`<vaadin-email-field>` is a Web Component for email field control in forms.

```html
<vaadin-email-field label="Email">
</vaadin-email-field>
```

### Styling

See vaadin-text-field.html for the styling documentation
